about.title: About Us
about.description: {siteName} is a community driven platform for finding ad spots and advertising opportunities.

advertise.title: Advertise
advertise.description: Promote your business or software on {siteName} and reach a wide audience of software enthusiasts.

cta.title: Need a custom partnership?
cta.description: Tell us more about your company and we will get back to you as soon as possible.

testimonial.quote: After advertising on this platform, we saw a 38% increase in qualified leads and 2.4x ROI within the first month. The targeted audience was exactly what our business needed. Highly recommended!

success.title: Thank you for your payment!
success.description: Please complete your advertisement setup by providing your company details.

login.title: Sign In
login.description: Get access to the dashboard and manage your ad spots.

verify.title: Check your inbox
verify.description: Check your inbox to sign in to {siteName}.
verify.instructions: We've sent you a magic link to {email}. Please click the link to confirm your address and sign in.
verify.no_email: No email in your inbox? Check your spam folder or <link>try a different email address</link>.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Manage your account and ad spots on {siteName}.

table.empty_state: No ad spots found. Submit an ad spot to get started.

blog.title: Blog
blog.description: A collection of useful articles for developers and software enthusiasts. Learn about the latest trends and technologies in the community.

categories.title: Browse Categories
categories.description: Browse all ad spot categories to find the perfect advertising opportunities for your needs.

category.title: {name} Ad Spots
category.description: A curated collection of the best {name} ad spots

tags.title: Browse Tags
tags.description: Browse all available tags to discover ad spots by specific features and capabilities.

tag.title: Ad spots tagged with "{name}"
tag.description: Explore ad spots tagged with {name} to find opportunities that match your specific needs.

agencys.title: Browse Agencies
agencys.description: Browse all available agencies to discover ad spots by specific agencies.

agency.title: Ad spots from "{name}"
agency.description: Explore ad spots from {name} to find opportunities that match your specific needs.

locations.title: Browse Locations
locations.description: Browse all available locations to discover ad spots by specific locations.

location.title: Ad spots located in "{name}"
location.description: Explore ad spots located in {name} to find opportunities that match your specific needs.

attributes.title: Browse Ad Spot Attributes
attributes.description: Browse ad spots by size, type, and features on {siteName}.

error.title: Something went wrong!
error.description: Please try again. If the problem persists, <link>contact support</link>.

not_found.title: 404 Not Found
not_found.description: We're sorry, but the page could not be found. You may have mistyped the address or the page may have moved.

submit.title: Add a free ad spot
submit.description: Listing on {siteName} is a great way to get more exposure for your ad spot. We only list high-quality ad spots that are useful for businesses.

feature.title: Boost {name}'s Visibility
feature.description: Upgrade {name}'s ad spot on {siteName} to get a verified featured badge, prominent placement in listings, and a do-follow backlink.

expedite.title: Choose a plan for {name}
expedite.description: Maximize {name}'s impact from day one. Select a package that suits your goalsâ€”from free listing to premium features.

featured.title: Thank you for your payment!
featured.description: We've received your payment. {name} should be featured on {siteName} shortly.

success.title: Thank you for submitting {name}!
success.description: We'll review {name}'s ad spot and publish it on {siteName} soon.
